scenario_text.value:
Why is it? I know Labramon would never say
such awful things to me, and yet...

My head went blank when she was talking, and
all these sad feelings welled up.

Hmm, maybe because it looked like the real
thing? It must’ve been a real shock.

More than anything, it’s probably because you
trust Labramon from the bottom of your heart.

Because you trust her so much, it’d cut that
much deeper if she really said that.
Oh... Yes, I think I understand.

Yes... Clearly I care about Labramon even
more than I thought.

I won’t let another doppelgänger fool me.
I’ll believe in Labramon.
